detaileddescription.para: sampling time of controller in ms

briefdescription.para: with a prescalar of 80 the period is in µs so 50000µs = 50ms
max. target pressure for UI input at 100%
min. target pressure for UI input at 0%
minimum pressure difference between traget pressure and actual pressure to activate; not essential
minimum supply pressure for system to work as expected; essential
minimum supply pressure for system to work as expected; essential
in case of insuficient supply pressure, the pressure in the cylinders will be reduced to less than neglectable pressure
to avoid target pressure being higher than supply pressure due to small short term pressure drops; not essential
prolongs open valve times in low supply pressure scenarios; not recommendet with regular 8bar supply
avoiding long unresponsive system periods in [ms]
too fast for valves to make a real change [ms]
